meanings.definition: Happening or appearing in the near future
meanings.sent1: The upcoming party is next week.
meanings.sent2: I am excited about the upcoming movie release.
meanings.sent3: The upcoming family reunion will be a blast.
meanings.sent4: The upcoming storm is brewing on the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The upcoming vacation is eagerly anticipated by all.

meanings.sent1: The upcoming holiday season brings joy to many.
meanings.sent2: We need to prepare for the upcoming exams.
meanings.sent3: The upcoming weekend is already fully booked.
meanings.sent4: The upcoming deadline is looming over us.
meanings.sent5: The upcoming changes will impact everyone in the company.
